The key issue facing the development of the Azerbaijani economy is the reduction of dependence on oil and gas.
More than one million permanent jobs have been created in Azerbaijan over the past 10 years, infrastructure and services have been thoroughly developed.
The dependence on imports on major consumer spheres has been reduced in Azerbaijan and measures are being taken in this direction.
Azerbaijan aims to compensate for the fall in oil prices by the production of other export-oriented products.
Significant steps are taken in Azerbaijan in order to stimulate export, further improve the investment and entrepreneurship environment.
